text: How do I extract a date range from a csv using perl/php/grep/etc?
Is there a way to take text like below (if it was already in an array or a file) and have it strip the lines with a specified date range?
For instance if i wanted every line from 2009-09-04 until 2009-09-09 to be pulled out (maybe this can be done with grep?
) how would I go about doing so?
